import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function SignIn() { const onSignIn = () => { const onSignUp = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const form = document.signinForm const data = { email: form.email.value, password: form.password.value, } const users = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('users')) if (!users) { localStorage.setItem('users', JSON.stringify([data])) } else if (isUserSignedUp(users, data.email)) { localStorage.setItem('users', JSON.stringify([...users, data])) } else { alert('You are already signed up, please signin') } } } return (
SignIn

SignUp

) } export default SignIn
